Default contructor that sets all properties to zero-values

SnakePoint

public SnakePoint(int x,
                  int y)
Contructor that creates java.awt.Point with coordinates(x, y). TextureIndex sets to 0, EatedFood to false & Direction to -1.

Parameters:
x - x coordinate of point
y - y coordinate of point

y - y coordinate of point
t - texture index

Parameters:

y - y coordinate of point
t - texture index
e - eated food
d - direction
